title: Employee Manuaal
creator: by Pro Man Team
about: Get your new hires up and running with this simple employee manual!
details: Dust off the age old employee manual for today’s modern workforce! Keep an always up-to-date employee manual that can easily be edited and reorganized in drag & drop. Clearly categorize topics by creating separate lists for benefits, expenses, company policies, etc. and facilitate access to important documents securely by attaching them to cards with storage services like Google Drive, Dropbox, and Box.
